metadata.title: CVE-2024-30205 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Emacs before 29.3, Org mode considers contents of remote files to betrusted. This affects Org Mode before 9.6.23.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-30205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

emacs - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-bin-common - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-common - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-el - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-gtk - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-lucid - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-nox - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
emacs-pgtk - 29.3+1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: emacs package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '29.3+1-1ubuntu2').
xemacs21 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
org-mode package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
